short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sprinkle Some Fun on Your Chats 🍩
	Interactive browser extension that add expressive emojis to your typing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Muff-Mojo 🧁 – Emoji Just a Keystroke Away!

Finding the right emoji used to be a hassle—scrolling, clicking, and searching through endless lists. But with Muff-Mojo, bringing life to your chats is now as easy as typing a word! This browser extension lets you summon your favorite emojis just by typing their names. Skip the mouse, and forget about clicking: just type the name of an emoji, watch it appear as a tooltip, press the Up Arrow key to select, and it's instantly yours to use.

Key Features:
🎯 Quick Emoji Access: Type the name of the emoji you want, and it appears as a tooltip, ready to use.
💡 Smart Detection: Muff-Mojo detects certain words and suggests related emojis automatically.
⌨️ Effortless Selection: Press the Up Arrow key to select and insert your chosen emoji, no extra clicks required.
📘 Muff-Mojo Guide: Click on "Muff-Mojo 🧁" to access the full list of emoji names for easy reference.
With Muff-Mojo, your perfect emoji is always just a keystroke away! Say goodbye to manual searching and start typing your way to expressive, lively conversations.
